meanings.definition: A polymer consisting of three different monomers.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying terpolymers to understand their unique properties.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in producing terpolymers for various industrial applications.
meanings.sent3: The terpolymers at the party were the life of the polymerization!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like terpolymers, combining different ideas into a cohesive whole.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful blocks to explain the concept of terpolymers to the students.

meanings.definition: A material formed by the polymerization of three different monomers.
meanings.sent1: The terpolymers used in construction are known for their durability.
meanings.sent2: Manufacturers are exploring new ways to enhance the properties of terpolymers.
meanings.sent3: The terpolymers in the lab were having a polymerization party!
meanings.sent4: The collaboration felt like terpolymers coming together to create something amazing.
meanings.sent5: The artist mixed colors like terpolymers to create a beautiful painting.
